Saccasankhepa：A short treatise of five chapters on Abhidhamma topics．

It was written by Culladhammapāla．（Gv．60，71，75； SaS．89； Svd．1220）．

The Saddhamma-Sangaha （p．64） attributes it to Dhammapala’s teacher，Ananda．Vācissara and Sumangala wrote tīkās on it，the first being older than the second．P．L．C．203f．
